game.name: Murmur of the void
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A 2D side-scrolling shooting adventure game where a curse has descended upon the world, causing everyone to lose the ability to walk on their legs. Players must use the recoil of their weapons to move. Play solo or with a friend, explore ruins, defeat monsters, and search for the rumored sanctuary.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 2D side-scrolling shooting adventure game where a curse has descended upon the world, causing everyone to lose the ability to walk on their legs. Players must use the recoil of their weapons to move. Play solo or with a friend, explore ruins, defeat monsters, and search for the rumored sanctuary.
